attributes.action: convict young offenders as adults for serious crimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's about time something was done about young people. They are basically allowed to beat somebody to within an inch of their life, and get a short sentence in an institute. i believe they should be sentenced as an adult and made to do the full sentence for such crimes. Morality is present in these kids so there is no excuse, a crime is a crime no matter who commits it.
